title: Trade, Impeachment & Iran
itunes:title: Trade, Impeachment & Iran
description:
Kevin spoke with Miranda Green, Congressional reporter at The Hill Jack Fitzpatrick, Bloomberg Government Congressional reporter and John Gans, former Chief Speechwriter at the Pentagon (up until 2017 for Secretary Ash Carter) and author of the new book White House Warriors. They discussed comments from President Trump House Speaker Nancy Pelosi. They also discussed trade talks and Iran.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
